title: How to Make Maggi Noodles with Vegetables

steps.headline: Take out 1 small cup beans, peas and paneer.
steps.description: Cut beans and paneer in small pieces and peel the peels of peas  .

steps.headline: Pour 3 big cups of water in a large microwave sized bowl.
steps.description: Pour all the vegetables you have cut and peeled in the bowl.

steps.headline: Boil the 1 packet of noodles in 2 big cups of water on gas stove until they're soft.
Add the boiled vegetables along with the spices given with the noodles.
steps.description: If desired, you can add more spices, too. Heat it while mixing the noodles for 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Add a squeeze of lemon juice in the noodles and mix.

text: Take out 1 small cup beans, peas and paneer. Cut beans and paneer in small pieces and peel the peels of peas  . Pour 3 big cups of water in a large microwave sized bowl. Pour all the vegetables you have cut and peeled in the bowl. Put the bowl in microwave. Cook the vegetables for 3 minutes. Boil the 1 packet of noodles in 2 big cups of water on gas stove until they're soft.  Add the boiled vegetables along with the spices given with the noodles. If desired, you can add more spices, too. Heat it while mixing the noodles for 2 minutes. Add a squeeze of lemon juice in the noodles and mix.  Garnish it with coriander.  Enjoy your noodles!
sentences: Take out 1 small cup beans, peas and paneer.
Cut beans and paneer in small pieces and peel the peels of peas  .
Pour 3 big cups of water in a large microwave sized bowl.
Pour all the vegetables you have cut and peeled in the bowl.
Boil the 1 packet of noodles in 2 big cups of water on gas stove until they're soft.
Add the boiled vegetables along with the spices given with the noodles.
If desired, you can add more spices, too.
Heat it while mixing the noodles for 2 minutes.
Add a squeeze of lemon juice in the noodles and mix.
